channel.title: Youtube on Azure 4 Everyone
channel.description: Adam Marczak blog created for purpose of personal contribution and sharing knowledge to communities everywhere.

item.title: Azure Cosmos DB Intro
item.description: Azure Cosmos DB is globally distributed and highly responsive database in the cloud. With just few clicks you can get multi-regional distribution and redundancy with high availability of 99.999%.

item.title: Azure Data Factory Parametrization
item.description: Parametrization in Azure Data Factory is essential to achieve good design and reusability as well as low cost of solution maintenance. Using parameters also speeds up implementation of new features in your pipelines.

item.title: Azure Databricks Intro
item.description: Azure Databricks is fast, easy to use and scalable big data collaboration platform. Based on Apache Spark brings high performance and benefits of spark without need of having high technical knowledge. You just write Python/Scala scripts and you are ready to go.

item.title: Azure Function Apps Intro
item.description: Serverless is powerful and flexible way of delivering fast and scalable solutions in Azure. Today we will get introduction about Azure Function Apps, one of my favorite services and one of the best serverless services out there.

item.title: Azure Storage Intro
item.description: Choosing the right storage solution is critical part of every application design. Azure Storage is one of the most flexible and powerful, yet simple services in Azure. With its four services (file, blob, queue and table) it can feed most of common needs.

item.title: Azure App Service Introduction
item.description: Web development is the beating heart of cloud applications. Azure App Service is one of key compute services which streamlines development and maintenance of web applications. It is powerful Platform as a Service offering with many of security and DevOps features.

item.title: Azure Data Factory Introduction
item.description: Azure Data Factory is essential service in all data related activities in Azure. It is flexible and powerful Platform as a Service offering with multitude of connectors and inetgration capabilities. It is a heart of ETL in Azure.

item.title: Azure Logic Apps Introduction
item.description: Azure Logic Apps are Enterprise Integration Service and as such their main purpose is orchestration, integration and scheduling of tasks in a simple way. With easy to use user interface, no coding design and powerful extensibility you can easily integrate services in minutes.
